title: Preventive healthcare: a shield against cancer and other non-communicable diseases
text:
Screenings such as mammography, detection of lung cancer through CT scans, or acetic acid visualisation of the cervix, along with age-appropriate physical activity, are proven methods of cancer prevention. However, people usually don’t prioritise healthcare. The only way to increase awareness is by educating them through audio-visual messages and the social media.
